name: Ants in an Hourglass
description:
Hint: don't buy sand unless you need to.

Ants in an Hourglass

This is my Ludum Dare 50 game. I made it with Godot Engine and had an amazing time!

Ants in an Hourglass is about ants in an hourglass. These ants don't like it when the sand gets in their eyes. Time to send the sand back to those dweebs from up above!

I'd really appreciate if you rated on the ldjam site: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/ants-in-an-hourglass

Thanks for playing!
